citation.article-title: Phenotypic and phylogenetic characterization of some Gemella-like organisms from human infections: description of Dolosigranulum pigrum gen. nov., sp. nov.

p.s: Description of Dolosigranulum pigrum sp. nov.
Dolosigranulum pigrum (pi'grum, L. n. adj. pigrum lazy)
Some strains grow better in aerobic conditions.
Acid is produced from D-glucose, galactose, D-fructose, D-mannose, maltose and L-fucose.
Some strains produce acid from D-arabinose, mannitol, sucrose and N-acetyl glucosamine.
Acid is not produced from adonitol, raffinose, lactose or pullulane.
Hippurate and aesculin are not hydrolysed.
Alkaline phosphatase, α-galactosidase, β-glucuronidase, β-glucosidase, alaninephenylalanineproline arylamidase, β-mannosidase and urease are not produced.
Cell wall murein type is LYS-D-ASP.
The G + C content of DNA is 40.5 mol%.
The type strain is NCFB 2975 ( = R91/1468).
